程序包 org.apache.flume.sink.jdbc

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AbstractJDBCSink
    A an abstract base class for different JDBC sinks.
    BodyParameter
    A subclass of parameter used to identify parameters that read from the event body (and not a header).
    ByteArrayBodyParameter
    A parameter that puts the byte array header into a the database as.
    CustomParameter
    A subclass of parameter used to identify custom parameters.
    DateHeaderParameter
    A parameter that takes a header value and parses a date value from it, using the provided formatter.
    DoubleHeaderParameter
    A parameter that takes a header value and parses a double value from it, using that value in the prepared statement.
    FloatHeaderParameter
    A parameter that takes a header value and parses a float value from it, using that value in the prepared statement.
    HeaderParameter
    A subclass of parameter used to identify parameters that read from a header (and not the body).
    IntHeaderParameter
    A parameter that takes a header value and parses an int value from it, using that value in the prepared statement.
    JDBCConnectionManager
    A wrapper to manage JDBC connections.
    LongHeaderParameter
    A parameter that takes a header value and parses a long value from it, using that value in the prepared statement.
    Parameter
    A "parameter" is an internal representation of the tokens "${...}" in the configured SQL statement.
    PreparedStatementJDBCSink  
    PreparedStatementParser
    A class to parse the SQL statement provided into the config.
    StringBodyParameter
    A parameter that converts the body of the event (a byte array) to a String.
    StringHeaderParameter
    A parameter that takes a header (which is a String already), does no conversion, and sets the value into the statement.
